dialogue.text: Greetings! We believe that 3D printing is the future of manufacturing, and we want to help you be a part of that future. That's why we're offering you a free 3D printer and some filament. It's yours to keep

options.text: Definitely! A free 3D printer and filament sounds amazing.
No, I don't think a 3D printer would be of use to me. Thanks anyway.

dialogue.text: Great! Here's your 3D printer and some filament to get you started. Have fun printing!
Oh, that's too bad. Well, if you change your mind, the offer still stands.
Take your time to think about it. The 3D printer will be here whenever you're ready.
